controller

Class ControllerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ControllerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ControllerManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    This class acts a provider for all the controllers. Every controller except AuthController should be retrieved from this class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ControllerManager

        public ControllerManager(java.util.UUID userId,
                         java.util.UUID functionId)
                  throws UnAuthorizedException,
                         DataAccessException,
                         InvalidInputException
        Parameters:
        userId - id of the user that wants to use the controller
        functionId - id of the function that the user wants to use
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - there is no function/user with that id or the user does not have that function
        UnAuthorizedException
        DataAccessException
